verses.verse: וּבַשָּׁנָ֨ה <WH8141> u-vash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁבִעִ֜ית <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'It And in the seventh הִתְחַזַּ֣ק <WH2388> hit-chaz-Zak strengthened יְהוֹיָדָ֗ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da', Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach himself and took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei the captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> ham-me-'ot of hundreds לַעֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <WH5838> la-'a-zar-Ya-hu Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יְרֹחָ֡ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham of Jeroham וּלְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> u-le-yish-ma-'El and Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְ֠הוֹחָנָן <WH3076> Ye-ho-cha-non of Jehohanan וְלַֽעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <WH5838> ve-la-'a-zar-Ya-hu and Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son עוֹבֵ֜ד <WH5744> o-Ved of Obed וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַעֲשֵׂיָ֧הוּ <WH4641> ma-'a-se-Ya-hu and Maaseiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son עֲדָיָ֛הוּ <WH5718> 'a-da-Ya-hu of Adaiah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֱלִישָׁפָ֥ט <WH478> 'e-li-sha-Fat and Elishaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son זִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> zich-Ri of Zichri עִמּ֥וֹ <WH5973> im-Mo into בַבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> vab-be-Rit. into covenant

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> vai-ya-Sob-bu And they went about בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> bi-hu-Dah, in Judah וַיִּקְבְּצ֤וּ <WH6908> vai-yik-be-Tzu and gathered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> 'a-Rei out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְרָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> ve-ra-Shei and the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. to Jerusalem

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <WH3772> vai-yich-Rot made כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַקָּהָ֥ל <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal And all the congregation בְּרִ֛ית <WH1285> be-Rit a covenant בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; with the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֗ם <WH1992> la-Hem, to them הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech unto them Behold the king's יִמְלֹ֔ךְ <WH4427> yim-Loch, shall reign כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons דָוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> da-Vid. of David

זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֨ית <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shit A third part מִכֶּ֜ם <WH4480> mik-Kem who בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> ba-'Ei of you entering הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-lal-vi-Yim, and of the Levites לְשֹֽׁעֲרֵ֖י <WH7778> le-sho-'a-Rei [shall be] porters הַסִּפִּֽים׃ <WH5592> has-sip-Pim. of the doors

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <WH7992> ve-hash-she-li-Shit And a third part בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, [shall be] at the king's וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <WH7992> ve-hash-she-li-Shit and a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> be-Sha-'ar at the gate הַיְס֑וֹד <WH3247> hay-Sod; of the foundation וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, and all the people בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <WH2691> be-chatz-Rot [shall be] in the courts בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- no יָב֣וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo But let none come בֵית־ <WH1004> veit- into the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim save the priests וְהַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <WH8334> ve-ham-sha-re-Tim and they that minister לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> lal-vi-Yim, of the Levites הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they יָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u they shall go in כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh for they [are] holy הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah; and let וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, but all the people יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> yish-me-Ru shall keep מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> mish-Me-ret the watch יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהִקִּיפוּ֩ <WH5362> ve-hik-ki-Fu shall compass הַלְוִיִּ֨ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim And the Levites אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech the king סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <WH3627> ve-che-Lav with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do, in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <WH935> ve-hab-Ba and whosoever [else] cometh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit into the house יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> yu-Mat; he shall be put to death וִֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> vih-Yu become אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- Thus be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech but be ye with the king בְּבֹא֥וֹ <WH935> be-vo-'O when he cometh in וּבְצֵאתֽוֹ׃ <WH3318> u-ve-tze-To. and when he goeth out

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su did הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim So the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, and all Judah כְּכֹ֣ל <WH3605> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּה֮ <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' according to all things that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu and took אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> 'a-na-Shav, one בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> ba-'Ei that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath עִ֖ם <WH5973> 'im were to יוֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> yotz-'Ei with them that were to go הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat; [out] on the sabbath כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not פָטַ֛ר <WH6362> fa-Tar dismiss יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽמַּחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <WH4256> Ham-mach-le-Kot. not the courses

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' Moreover Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> le-sa-Rei to the captains הַמֵּא֗וֹת <WH3967> ham-me-'ot, of hundreds אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽחֲנִיתִים֙ <WH2595> ha-cha-ni-Tim spears וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמָּגִנּוֹת֙ <WH4043> ham-ma-gin-nOt and bucklers וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <WH7982> hash-she-la-Tim, and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> lam-Me-lech that [had been] king דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> da-Vid; David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit which [were] in the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Med And he set אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am all the people וְאִ֣ישׁ׀ <WH376> ve-'Ish every man שִׁלְח֣וֹ <WH7973> shil-Cho having his weapon בְיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> ve-ya-Do, in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <WH3802> mik-Ke-tef side הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <WH3233> hay-ma-Nit from the right עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> Ke-tef side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <WH8042> has-se-ma-Lit, to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> lam-miz-Be-ach along by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> ve-lab-Ba-yit; and the temple עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech by the king סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> vai-yo-Tzi-'u Then they brought out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, the king's וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu and put עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <WH5145> han-Ne-zer upon him the crown וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut, and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <WH4427> vai-yam-Li-chu and made him king אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH4886> vai-yim-sha-Chu-hu anointed יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' And Jehoiada וּבָנָ֔יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav, and his sons וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru him and said יְחִ֥י <WH2421> ye-Chi God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. the king ס sa-Mek

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> vat-tish-Ma' heard עֲתַלְיָ֗הוּ <WH6271> 'a-tal-Ya-hu, Now when Athaliah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol the noise הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people הָֽרָצִ֔ים <WH7323> ha-ra-Tzim, running וְהַֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <WH1984> ve-ham-hal-Lim and praising אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; the king וַתָּב֥וֹא <WH935> vat-ta-Vo she came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am to the people בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַתֵּ֡רֶא <WH7200> vat-Te-re And she looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> ham-me-leCh and behold the king עוֹמֵ֨ד <WH5975> o-Med stood עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside עַמּוּד֜וֹ <WH5982> am-mu-Do at his pillar בַּמָּב֗וֹא <WH3996> bam-ma-Vo, at the entering in וְהַשָּׂרִ֣ים <WH8269> ve-has-sa-Rim and the princes וְהַחֲצֹצְרוֹת֮ <WH2689> ve-ha-cha-tzo-tze-rOt and the trumpets עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> ham-me-leCh by the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all עַ֨ם <WH5971> 'am and all the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land שָׂמֵ֗חַ <WH8055> sa-Me-ach, cheer up וְתוֹקֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8628> ve-to-Ke-a' and sounded בַּחֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <WH2689> ba-cha-Tzo-tze-Rot, with trumpets וְהַמְשֽׁוֹרֲרִים֙ <WH7891> ve-ham-sho-ra-Rim also the singers בִּכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> bich-Lei with instruments הַשִּׁ֔יר <WH7892> hash-Shir, of musick וּמוֹדִיעִ֖ים <WH3045> u-mo-di-'Im and such as taught לְהַלֵּ֑ל <WH1984> le-hal-Lel; to sing praise וַתִּקְרַ֤ע <WH7167> vat-tik-Ra' rent עֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH6271> 'a-tal-Ya-hu Then Athaliah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּגָדֶ֔יהָ <WH899> be-ga-Dei-ha, her clothes וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer and said קֶ֥שֶׁר <WH7195> Ke-sher Treason קָֽשֶׁר׃ <WH7195> Ka-sher. Treason ס sa-Mek

וַיּוֹצֵא֩ <WH3318> vai-yo-Tze brought out יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> ye-ho-ya-Da' Then Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> sa-Rei the captains הַמֵּא֣וֹת׀ <WH3967> ham-me-'ot of hundreds פְּקוּדֵ֣י <WH6485> pe-ku-Dei that were set over הַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> ha-Cha-yil, the host וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem to הֽוֹצִיא֙וּהָ֙ <WH3318> ho-tzi-'U-ha unto them Have her forth אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> mib-Beit her not in the house הַשְּׂדֵר֔וֹת <WH7713> has-se-de-Rot, the ranks וְהַבָּ֥א <WH935> ve-hab-Ba abide אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-ha after that יוּמַ֣ת <WH4191> yu-Mat her let him be slain בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> be-Cha-rev; with the sword כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen, For the priest לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תְמִית֖וּהָ <WH4191> te-mi-Tu-ha Slay בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD
